actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution urging the expeditious completion of the Subcommittee on Communication's review of the Communications Act of 1934.

summary.text: States that a review of the national telecommunications policy should be completed expeditiously by the Subcommittee on Communication of the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

titles.title: Resolution urging the expeditious completion of the Subcommittee on Communication's review of the Communications Act of 1934.
